name: policies
description: Policy documents for services run by New Vector

scripts.build:mkdir: rm -rf build && mkdir -p build && cd docs && find . -type d | cpio -pd ../build
scripts.build:genhtml: echo "Converting md -> HTML:"; for filename in $(cd docs && find . -name '*.md' | grep -v "README.md"); do echo " - $filename -> build/${filename%???}.html"; md2html docs/$filename > build/${filename%???}.html; done
scripts.build: npm run build:mkdir && npm run build:genhtml

author: Thomas Lant
